ygData.msgSnippet: * Iron Raptor snapped her head towards Beachcomber and Smokescreen as they approached her, it surprised her to see how they seemed to approache her with what

Subject: Re: Change In Command - The Beginning of a New Maximal Heiarchy
From: Iron Raptor <ironraptor13@...>


* Iron Raptor snapped her head towards Beachcomber and Smokescreen as they approached her, it surprised her to see how they seemed to approache her with what looked like respect for authority. But her third-in-command position almost gave her no authority at all, seemingly nothing more then a field soldier with a fancy name.
She halted as they both came up to her and was extremely surprised to hear them request for orders, wasn't that Liono's job...to give the orders. She looked around puzzled for a moment before looking back towards the two Maximals, not really sure what to do.*

" Request orders? Isn't Liono around?"

* But a quick scan revieled that he was not, she just shrugged and kept her arm around Prowl for support.*

" Well, the base is pretty slaged. Rally all of the non-damaged bot's together and split them up into two groups. The majority will help the base repair system reconstruct the ship and the other..."

* Her own damage was slowing her down, the bleeding and sore side that just happened to be right against Prowl. She sighed.*

" The other will be a sub-defence system, armed with some of the most powerful weapons we have in the Weapon's Hold.They'll be defending the ship along with the repair bot's as they work. As more bot's finish repair from the CR chambers, more will either join the repair team or the defence team until the ship is fully functional. We're just too weak right now, another attack may destroy the ship along with us inside it. Any attacks will be met within reason but with force."

* She then began to move off towards the CR chambers and hoped that those orders were good enough, her own puzzlement still in her mind.*

" Until further orders are give...those are mine."
